message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to commit up to $850,000 for this purchase. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm unable to go that low at this time.  I'm willing to come down to $875,000 to make this deal work.  Let's meet in the middle and see if we can find common ground.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $860,000. This is the highest I can go while still staying within my budget. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
